prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The algorithms are described as fundamental building blocks in machine learning. Understanding these algorithms is crucial for tackling a wide range of problems and serves as a foundation for more advanced techniques. The list is particularly useful for beginners in the field of machine learning.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Algorithms, fundamental building blocks, machine learning, understanding, problems, foundation, advanced techniques, beginners
